title: LINE Corporation : consolidated revenue 2013 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Revenue in billion Japanese yen and Q2 '13 has the lowest Revenue in billion Japanese yen.
There is a difference of 52.6 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q2 '13.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in the y axis.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in the y axis.
Quarter Q4 '19 has the highest Revenue in billion Japanese yen and Q2 '13 has the lowest Revenue in billion Japanese yen.
There is a difference of 52.6 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q2 '13.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in billion Japanese yen 60.8 is found at Quarter Q4 '19 and the minimum is found at Q2 '13 where Quarter is 8.2.
Second maximum Revenue in billion Japanese yen is found at Quarter Q4 '18.
There is a difference of 52.6 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q2 '13.
Revenue in billion Japanese yen at Quarter Q4 '19 is 60.8 , second place is Q4 '18 at 56.0, and thirdly is Q4 '18 at 56.0.
Over the past 27 Quarters, the Revenue in billion Japanese yen has decreased.
Quarter Q3 '19, and Q4 '18 share the same value 56.0.
The lowest value 8.2 at Q2 '13 is almost 1.65 times smaller than the average value 36.8.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is 993.5 if we add up values of all Quarters.
